name: Shanks_AlphaBuild
description:
A top down horde mode game currently in development in my spare time.

Check back for updates or follow me on twitter @kalobrienz to get notified when I add things. Still very early in development!

I suggest playing it in Fullscreen mode!

Controls:
  • Movement: WASD
  • Q to Start
  • R to Restart
  • Left MB to shoot
  • Mouse to aim
